constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 211 (Tuesday, December 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GONZALEZ of Ohio:
H.R. 6154.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
To make all Laws which shall be necessary arid proper for
carcying into Execution the foregoing Powers, and all other
Powers vested by the Constitution in th Government ofthe
United States, or in any Department of Officer thereof
[Page H7262]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

title: Accelerating Nuclear Innovation through Fee Reform Act
